reference.text: containers, casings or accessories for cosmetic substances, e.g. shaving soap, lipstick, make-up A45D34/00, A45D40/00

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass, the following expression is used with the meaning indicated:"writing implements" covers pens, pencils, crayons, chalks or like markers for writing or drawing
In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

reference.text: for indicating or recording apparatus G01D15/16

CPC-specific-text.text: with resilient supporting means for the ball, e.g. springs
with an intermediate element between the resilient supporting means and the ball

reference.text: holders for continuously adjustable nibs B43K17/00
mechanisms for retracting or locking nibs B43K24/00

title-part.text: Pens with ink reservoirs in holders, e.g. fountain-pens

reference.text: nibs or writing-points with ink reservoirs B43K1/01; ball-point pens B43K7/00; pens with writing-points other than nibs or balls B43K8/00; multiple-point writing implements B43K27/00

title-part.text: specially adapted for concentrated ink, e.g. solid ink

reference.text: mechanisms for retracting or locking nibs B43K24/00

title-part.text: Arrangements for feeding the ink to the nibs

opened by actuation of the writing point

reference.text: nibs with ball points with resilient supporting means, e.g. acting as a valve B43K1/086

when the writing point points upwards

title-part.text: the gas acting on a piston

reference.text: mechanisms for retracting or locking ball points B43K24/00

title-part.text: Pens with writing-points other than nibs or balls

reference.text: brushes with reservoir for supplying substances A46B11/00

CPC-specific-text.text: using a spraying system, e.g. airbrushes

title-part.text: with writing-points comprising fibres, felt, or similar porous or capillary material

Wick feed from within reservoir to writing-points
including compartment for soluble solid material
writing-points or writing-point units being separable from reservoir

CPC-specific-text.text: Arrangements for feeding the ink to the writing-points

title-part.text: with tubular writing-points comprising a movable cleaning element
Arrangements for feeding the ink to the writing-points
with electrically or magnetically activated writing-points
characterised by the means for retracting writing-points
Devices for cleaning nibs, e.g. by wiping

reference.text: ink receptacles with pen-wiping means B43L25/12

title-part.text: for cleaning nibs, e.g. ink reservoirs therein

reference.text: features common to fountain pens B43K5/00

title-part.text: Nibs having more than two legs
Holders with arrangements for drawing dotted lines

reference.text: batik pencils, cord-line chalkers B44D3/00; writing-core compositions for pencils, crayon compositions, chalk compositions C09D13/00

title-part.text: the writing-core being made from substance wearing off during use
the writing-core being made from wear-resistant substances

reference.text: projecting mechanisms for writing units B43K24/00; multiple-point writing implements B43K27/00

CPC-specific-text.text: with lead sections or lead cartridges

title-part.text: with automatic feed by pressure during use of pencil
with the writing-cores brought into position by gravity

CPC-specific-text.text: with writing-cores automatically replaced from magazines

with the writing-cores fed by screws
with writing-cores automatically replaced from magazines
with writing-cores automatically replaced from magazines
Assembling, finishing, or repairing propelling pencils
Holders or connectors for writing implements

Holders for attachment to finger tips
enabling the writing implement to be set upright
Means for connecting two or more writing implements

for locking a single writing unit in only fully projected or retracted positions

title-part.text: operated by means sliding in longitudinally-slotted casings
for selecting, projecting and locking several writing units
operating by means sliding in longitudinally-slotted casings

CPC-specific-text.text: with one push-button for each writing unit
selection by gravity with a pendulum or the like

title-part.text: Attaching writing implements to wearing apparel or objects involving constructional changes of the implements

reference.text: protecting means, e.g. caps B43K23/08; garment-holding devices A44B99/00; fastening articles to wearing apparel A45F5/02

combined with means for propelling, projecting or retracting the writing unit

reference.text: B43K29/00 takes precedence; mechanisms for selecting, projecting, retracting or locking writing units B43K24/00; multiple writing devices with pantographic linkages B43L13/12

CPC-specific-text.text: only one holder being used either for the pencil or the pen

title-part.text: Combinations of writing implements with other articles

with optical equipment, e.g. magnifier, viewer
with sound or noise making devices, e.g. radio, alarm
